SELECT a.id as prop_id, a.channel_id, a.feed_cat_path, a.feed_prop_original, a.feed_prop_translation, a.display_order, a.created, a.creater, a.modified, a.modifier FROM voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_feed_custom_prop a WHERE a.channel_id = #{channelId} AND a.feed_cat_path = #{feedCatPath} ORDER BY a.display_order

mapper.select:
SELECT v1.id as value_id, v1.prop_id, p1.feed_cat_path as cat_path, p1.feed_prop_original as prop_original, p1.feed_prop_translation as prop_translation, v1.feed_value_original as value_original, v1.feed_value_translation as value_translation, v2.feed_value_translation as ref_value FROM voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_feed_custom_prop p1 INNER JOIN voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_feed_custom_prop_value v1 ON p1.id = v1.prop_id and v1.prop_id != 0 LEFT JOIN voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_feed_custom_prop_value v2 ON v1.feed_value_original = v2.feed_value_original and v2.prop_id = 0 and v2.channel_id = #{channelId} WHERE p1.channel_id = #{channelId}
AND p1.feed_cat_path = #{feedCatPath}
AND (v1.feed_value_translation is null OR LENGTH(trim(v1.feed_value_translation)) = 0)
AND (v1.feed_value_translation is not null AND LENGTH(trim(v1.feed_value_translation)) > 0)
AND ( p1.feed_prop_original like CONCAT('%',#{propName},'%') or p1.feed_prop_translation like CONCAT('%',#{propName},'%') )
AND (v1.feed_value_original like CONCAT('%',#{propValue},'%') or v1.feed_value_translation like CONCAT('%',#{propValue},'%') )
ORDER BY p1.feed_cat_path, p1.display_order,v1.feed_value_original
